c74object.name: sy.utoi
c74object.digest: Decode UTF-8 characters into a list of integers (code units)
c74object.description: Converts symbols (in UTF-8 encoding), into a list of integers, representing code units. The output integers can represent UTF-8, UTF-16 or UTF-32 encoding of each codepoint.

inlet.digest: List of integer values, depending on the encoding

inlet.description: For each element of the list output at left, there's an integer in this list: 1 if the element starts a codepoint (leading integer), 0 otherwise (trailing integer).

method.name: anything
method.description: Outputs the incoming list of symbols, each converted with the defined encoding into a sequence of integers. Space between atoms is replaced by a 32 (space character). For each output integer, another list contains the information whether the integer is a leading integer (1, if the integer starting the codepoint encoding) or not (0, if the integer is a trailing one). This latter list is output from the right outlet, then the forme is output from the left one.

method.name: bang
method.description: Output the integer lists for the most recently received input data.

attribute.name: encoding
attribute.description: Sets the output encoding: default is UTF-32.

attribute.name: maxdecimals
attribute.digest: Maximum Decimal Digits For Number Conversion
attribute.description: Sets the maximum number of decimals to be used for the conversion from number to symbol, in case the numbers attribute is set to "Convert To Symbol".

attribute.name: label
attribute.value: Maximum Decimal Digits For Number Conversion

attribute.name: numin

c74object.discussion: Information about leading and trailing code units is also output from the right outlet.

entry.name: Inlet 1 (list)
entry.description: List of integer values, depending on the encoding.

entry.name: Inlet 2 (list)
entry.description: Leading integer information. For each element of the list output at left, there's an integer in this list: 1 if the element starts a codepoint (leading integer), 0 otherwise (trailing integer).
